question: The average marks of 32 boys of the section A of class 10th is 60 whereas the average marks of 40 boys of section B of class 10th is 33. The average marks for both the sections combined together is:
explanation:
Required average $latex = \\frac{32\\times 60 + 33\\times 40}{72}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{1920+1320}{72} = \\frac{3240}{72} = 45&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
